# This file is autogenerated
title: prepareSign
description: Overview of the prepareSign method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wallet-apis/functions/prepareSign
---

Prepares a signature request for signing messages or transactions.

## Import

```ts
import { prepareSign } from "@alchemy/wallet-apis";
```

## Usage

```ts
// Prepare a message to be signed
const result = await client.prepareSign({
  from: "0x1234...",
  type: "personal_sign",
  data: "Hello, world!",
});
```

## Parameters

### client

`InnerWalletApiClient`

- The wallet API client to use for the request

### params

`PrepareSignParams`

- Parameters for preparing the signature request

## Returns

`Promise<PrepareSignResult>`
A Promise that resolves to the prepare sign result containing a signature request
